name: madnes
text: Mostly just shot is all

name: madnes
text: A comment left by madnes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, Overmedicated, lateadopter)

name: joeyramoney
text: good form, sir.

name: hellaedgar
text: The first strip I read!

name: deancain29
text: Philippe's concerned face. he's such a rad friend.

name: straw
text: It doesn't get said enough that Phillipe is completely rad

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: I dunno.  It'd be kinda like if the queen woke you up every morning.  Too Special.

name: spinynorman
text:
I have a weiner dog that is basically Philippe, and whenever he can he wakes me up in this manner.

It gets old pretty goddamn fast, especially when a dude was way slanted on cold ones the previous night.

name: farqussus
text: he sits by your bed stammering forlornly?

name: spinynorman
text: Well, he's pretty anxious

name: mercuri0us
text: Phillipe does kinda look like a weiner dog, now that you mention it.

name: satellitetv
text: he...is...RAD!

name: saint
text: we all friends!

name: achewoodno1fan
text:
dead cain i see your face all the time look
there it is again |\

name: deancain29
text: I get around and such.

name: slanger
text: "except for that I am shot"  Truer words...

name: trollcollins
text:
There is something really touching about Roast beef - Philippe interactions. Like, as characters they are on the opposite ends of so many spectrums, but there's sweetness there, too. Maybe that's why the sweetness is there?

Anyway: awww.

name: dougthehead
text: It's funny that Ray and Beef are in Achewood when they both obviously came from somewhere out of the Gothic South, probably originally the stuffed animals for one of Faulkner's characters.  You can see that in Ray's family, for example, or in Beef's insistence on calling women "ladies."

name: slalvation
text: I don't know, I almost always call ladies "ladies," and I've never lived farther south than Pennsylvania.

name: foetus_punch
text: I live in Canada, and I call women ladies. Mostly because I am uncomfortable around women.

name: jaldor
text: Ray and Beef are real cats, not stuffed animals.

name: stuart
text:
It's OK, Beef. You'll get to kis a lady the third time around.

Well, almost.

name: peterjoel
text: Is it ok for a man to cry just a little, while reading this strip? A friend of mine was asking, that's all.

name: rowboat
text: Philippe did not help Beef get his smiles on.

name: jack
text:
This little guy is one of my favorite strips. I agree with trollcollins about the sweetness of Roast Beef/Philippe interactions. They both just try their best.

In case I ever am shot I have instructed several friends to come have this exact conversation with me.

name: lobster_mobster
text: One of the few times that Beef matches up to Phillippe in terms of "Aww"

name: unsentletter
text: Oh!  So sad!

name: mattylite
text: Come on, somebody say it.  Somebody say "the saddest thing."

name: pzukowski
text: Man, that's rough.  If I were a lady, I'd give that boy a big old kiss.

name: solobuttons
text: get ya smiles on

name: ketelcat
text:
I think we can all learn a valuable lesson about kissing ladies and getting shot, here...
Don't get shot and then you won't have to admit to your rad friend that you've never kissed a lady.

name: mikeronomicon
text: But if you do get shot then you get to kiss a rad lady while riding your sex bicycle. I think.
